Westin La Quinta Golf Resort & Spa

Set in a picturesque Golf Valley, The Westin La Quinta Golf Resort & Spa has a spa, 27-hole golf course, free 24-hour gym and 2 swimming pools surrounded by gardens

With free WiFi, the luxurious, air-conditioned rooms at The Westin La Quinta Golf Resort & Spa feature contemporary decor. Each has a private terrace with views of the gardens, pool, golf course or Sierra Blanca Mountains. Some rooms offer spectacular panoramic views. All rooms come equipped with a satellite TV, safe, and private bathroom with hairdryer, slippers and dressing gown.
